General.Name: iDimension Consolidated Bhd
General.Description: Evd Berhad, an investment holding company, provides information and communications technology (ICT) system solutions for transportation infrastructure in Malaysia and Philippines. The company operates through three segments: Transportation, Healthcare, and Other segments. It offers transportation system solutions to the railways, urban rail transit, roads, and highways; services to the hospitality industries; and ICT system solutions for integrated security system and engineering services. The company also offers solutions for integrated services that include consulting, design engineering, documentation, training, installation, maintenance, and project management. The company was formerly known as iDimension Consolidated Berhad and changed its name to Evd Berhad in June 2022. Evd Berhad was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Selangor, Malaysia.
